change.item: This finding aid was updated in alignment with LC EAD 2.0 specifications using a python script created by Erik Radio.

did.head: Collection Summary
did.unittitle: Citizen's Utilities Committee of Tucson records 1943-1944
did.abstract: The collection includes information regarding the proposed purchase of the Tucson, Gas, Electric Light and Power Company by the City of Tucson. This includes minutes of meetings, correspondence, clippings, and related material.

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: University of Arizona Libraries, Special Collections

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: There are no restrictions on this collection.

prefercite.head: Credit Line
prefercite.p: Citizen's Utilities Committee of Tucson records (AZ 402). Special Collections, University of Arizona Libraries.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Includes minutes of meetings, correspondence, clippings, and related material.
Regarding the proposed purchase of the Tucson, Gas, Electric Light and Power Company by the City of Tucson.
